snippet: For Emilio Morenatti, who lost his foot in Afghanistan in 2009, photographing the Paralympics for The Associated Press was a special opportunity to work, honoring disabled athletes whose challenges resemble his own.
abstract: For Emilio Morenatti, who lost his foot in Afghanistan in 2009, photographing the Paralympics for The Associated Press was a special opportunity to work, honoring disabled athletes whose challenges resemble his own.

headline.main: An Empathetic Eye on the Paralympics
